title: Geraint Thomas: Ineos Grenadiers Must ‘Look in the Mirror’ This Off-Season
content:
Speaking on their podcast, Rowe and Thomas admit it's time to shake things up at the former Tour de France dominator: 'It’s not one thing, but there are loads of things, and it all adds up.'

Read the full article at Geraint Thomas: Ineos Grenadiers Must ‘Look in the Mirror’ This Off-Season on Velo.
author: ahood
